definition: to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: He straightened himself up, and rooted himself upon that point of support with a sort of fury.
sentences.chinese: 他豎起身來又彎下去，拚命在這個支點上站穩。

sentences.english: If any "Fulcrums" saw combat, their numbers were extremely small.
sentences.chinese: 如果有任何“支點”看到作戰，他們的人數極少。

sentences.english: A fine stick of gradual decrease in cross-section is supported by a fulcrum and keeps its balance in the horizontal direction.
sentences.chinese: 截面漸減細棒由一支點支撐，在水平方向上保持平衡。

sentences.english: It pivots high in the aluminum frame to maximize rear wheel traction.
sentences.chinese: 它在鋁支點架高，以最大限度地提高後輪的牽引力。

sentences.english: Gesture is the strong point of the refrain.
When price returns to the median line , a pivot will usually occur.
sentences.chinese: 當價格返回到中間線，一個支點通常會發生。

sentences.english: Third, the claim that some format is "Wutou" is supportive of the "Guanmu" hypothesis.
sentences.chinese: 其三，“某調是務頭”是“關目統攝”說的支點。

sentences.english: " Roller " fulcrum rocker trunnion as is, "where" mounting screws.
sentences.chinese: 輥耳軸，搖臂支點在哪裏其安裝螺栓原樣。

sentences.english: We unconsciously assume the center of a picture corresponds to a fulcrum.
sentences.chinese: 我們的潛意識中認爲一幅圖的中心是一個支點。

sentences.english: Yang-ming's Theory is literati's supporting point with which they doubt and criticize the reality.
sentences.chinese: 陽明心學爲文人作家懷疑和批判現實提供了精神支點。

sentences.english: I took one guiltily, lit it and smoked with satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 我內疚地接過一支點上，心滿意足地抽起來。

sentences.english: With fulcrum at end of shaft , the center of gravity is changed and clubhead feels much heavier.
sentences.chinese: 由於支點的杆柄末端，重心的改變使杆頭感覺更重。

sentences.english: It draws out the pivot of theism.
Also, a climbing move in which the climber lunges or leaps to the next hold.
sentences.chinese: 也指攀登者躍向下一個支點的動作。

sentences.english: This is the reason for the movement of the shoulder, which is based on the joint of the chest.
sentences.chinese: 這就是以胸鎖關節爲支點的肩部向前可動性的原由。

sentences.english: Upper arm pivots have 4-step cam adjustment for easy roll center changes.
sentences.chinese: 上臂支點有4步凸輪調整容易軋輥中心的變化。
